price: ߞߎߡߊ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߡߊߝߊ߬ߟߋ߲߬ ߠߊ߫ ߒ ߓߘߊ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߒ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߖߐ߲߭ ߠߎ߫ ߕߐ߬ߢߍ߰ߓߊ߯ ߘߌ߫
arabic: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: mā yubaddalu al-qawlu ladayya wamā anā biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
